archimate:Requirement.name: Financial reports must be aggregated over dimentions like products, clients, suppliers, countries, locations, qualities, quantities.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Use Case for #1: Report summarizing invoices pertaining to specific products, clients/suppliers, countries, locations, qualities, quantities, or other relevant categories. Key use case to be explored further: Supplier/Client account statements, allowing a customer or supplier to see past and future invoices (receivables/payables) in the database.
